posts.post_content: Does anyone have a t205 lot that they are trying to sell. I only have around 50 cards and would like to buy around 30-100 cards. Or if you have a smaller lot of harder cards to get or hofs that would be great to. If you have anything please pm me.
There is a guy in the bst area selling a big lot, check it out
I was gonna grab that lot but he had sold it already
